snippet: Rescuers have recovered eight bodies of the more than 150 people believed buried, as more rain threatened the continuing search efforts in Mankha.
abstract: Nepalese officials say rescuers stand no chance of finding any of the more than 150 people buried by landslide in northern Nepal; rain hampers search efforts and blocked river continues to swell into lake; rescuers have recovered only eight bodies.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers have recovered eight bodies of the more than 150 people believed buried, as more rain threatened the continuing search efforts in Mankha.

headline.main: Rescue Hopes in Landslide Fade in Nepal
headline.print_headline: Rescue Hopes in Landslide Fade in Nepal
